title: task search
description: add task search across all columns

implementationPlan.description: Add search text field to MoeToolWindowPanel header toolbar. Add a JTextField (or SearchTextField from IntelliJ platform) next to the existing epic filter dropdown in the right panel. Add a searchQuery state variable (private var searchQuery: String = ""). Wire an ActionListener/DocumentListener so that typing updates searchQuery and calls updateBoard(lastState). Include error handling: guard against null lastState when triggering re-render. Add a "Search:" label using MoeBundle.
implementationPlan.note: Added searchQuery state variable, JTextField with DocumentListener in header before epic filter. Typing triggers updateBoard re-render.

implementationPlan.description: Add search filtering logic to updateBoard(). After the existing epic filter (line 268-272), add a second filter step: if searchQuery is not blank, filter tasks where title or description contains the query (case-insensitive). This ensures search works across ALL columns since filtering happens before tasks are distributed to columns. Include error handling for empty/whitespace-only queries (treat as no filter).
implementationPlan.note: Added search filtering after epic filter. Renamed intermediate variable to epicFiltered, then applied case-insensitive search on title and description.

implementationPlan.description: Add bundle messages for search UI. Add keys: moe.panel.searchLabel=Search: and moe.panel.searchPlaceholder=Search tasks... to MoeBundle.properties for the search text field label and placeholder text.
implementationPlan.note: Added moe.panel.searchLabel and moe.panel.searchPlaceholder bundle keys under new Search section.

implementationPlan.description: Test the search feature. Build the plugin with ./gradlew buildPlugin to verify compilation. Verify that: (1) search field appears in the header bar, (2) typing filters tasks across all 6 columns in real-time, (3) clearing the field restores all tasks, (4) search works in combination with epic filter (both filters apply), (5) empty/whitespace queries show all tasks. Since this is Swing UI, test via runIde sandbox.
implementationPlan.note: Plugin builds successfully. All 221 daemon tests pass.
